mapper.select: select P.product_idx, brand_name, name, subname, price, discount, discount_price, is_kurlyonly, PI.url from Product P left join Brand B on P.brand_idx = B.brand_idx left join marketkurly_ver1.ProductImage PI on P.product_idx = PI.product_idx where name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select P.product_idx, B.brand_name, P.name, P.subname, P.price, P.discount, P.discount_price, P.sales_unit, P.weight, P.source, P.type, P.packaging_type, P.Allergie_info, P.distinct_delivery, P.notice, P.shelf_life, PI.url
from Product P left join marketkurly_ver1.ProductImage PI on P.product_idx = PI.product_idx left join Brand B on P.brand_idx = B.brand_idx where P.product_idx = #{product_idx};
select exists(select * from Favorite where product_idx = #{product_idx} and user_idx = #{userIdxByJwt}) as user_islike, count(*) as review_cnt from ProductReview where product_idx = #{product_idx};

select PR.review_idx, PR.review_title, PR.review_desc, PR.update_at, U.name as user_name, PR.views, PR.help_count from ProductReview PR inner join User U on PR.user_idx = U.user_idx where product_idx = #{product_idx}
